test.name: Opening Myntra Web Application

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.msg:
ElementClickInterceptedException: Message: element click intercepted: Element
...
is not clickable at point (984, 599). Other element would receive the click:
(Session info: chrome=98.0.4758.82) Stacktrace: Backtrace: Ordinal0 [0x011D7AC3+2587331] Ordinal0 [0x0116ADD1+2141649] Ordinal0 [0x01063BB8+1063864] Ordinal0 [0x010965FF+1271295] Ordinal0 [0x01094849+1263689] Ordinal0 [0x0109248B+1254539] Ordinal0 [0x01091289+1249929] Ordinal0 [0x01086DD3+1207763] Ordinal0 [0x010A868C+1345164] Ordinal0 [0x010867A4+1206180] Ordinal0 [0x010A87E4+1345508] Ordinal0 [0x010B8A0A+1411594] Ordinal0 [0x010A84A6+1344678] Ordinal0 [0x010853F6+1201142] Ordinal0 [0x010862E6+1204966] GetHandleVerifier [0x0137DF22+1680738] GetHandleVerifier [0x01430DBC+2413564] GetHandleVerifier [0x0126D151+563089] GetHandleVerifier [0x0126BF13+558419] Ordinal0 [0x0117081E+2164766] Ordinal0 [0x01175508+2184456] Ordinal0 [0x01175650+2184784] Ordinal0 [0x0117F5BC+2225596] BaseThreadInitThunk [0x76DCFA29+25] RtlGetAppContainerNamedObjectPath [0x77207A9E+286] RtlGetAppContainerNamedObjectPath [0x77207A6E+238]
